channel.title: How to make the server online
channel.description: Hey guys, I'm currently new to MoparScape and when I try to make a server it says my server is offlinebut how do I make it online, I saw no option for that please help

item.title: How to make the server online
item.dc:creator: @blazkiller123 blazkiller123
item.description:
@blazkiller123 wrote:

please refrain from double posting as it’s not necesary.
there are plenty of guides on setting up a server.

for some basic tips.

u need a source
u need a client

run the source
run the client(with it edited to log into ur ip of choice)

u need no-ip duc to have ur own ip address instead of ur pc’s(if u use ur pc’s you can easily be hacked)

u need to portforward port 43594 in your routers setting.

go to start and search for cmd or command

run it

and then type in

ipconfig and see what ur “default gateway” is, portforward 43594 to that ip address.

and it should say it’s online when u make a server status page for it.

hope these quick tips help, goodluck, if you want some additional help, either find a tutourial by googling.

or msn me @ shana3422@hotmail.com

goodluck, matt

Read full topic
item.source: How to make the server online

item.title: How to make the server online
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Legalize It, post:3, topic:439665”]It would be easier if u could just tell me how to make my server “online” when I am on the register server page but it says in the rules my server has to be online but where is that option to make it online?[/quote]I don’t deal with rsps related items anymore sadly.

I was just merely directing you to a more appropriate place to look for an answer to your issue.
